com.devwebsphere.wxsutils.jmx
Class TabularDataMetaData<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.devwebsphere.wxsutils.jmx.TabularDataMetaData<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The MBeanImpl being managed
public class TabularDataMetaData<T>
extends java.lang.Object

This is used to track attribute meta data for a specific TabularData type. It also is used to fetch only those attributes as a CompositeDataType for each row.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs the class to manage rows from a collection of MBeans.

Constructor Detail

TabularDataMetaData

public TabularDataMetaData(SummaryMBeanSource<T> bs,
                           java.lang.String idColumnName,
                           java.lang.Class<T> source,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String typeName,
                           java.lang.String typeDescription)
                    throws javax.management.openmbean.OpenDataException
Constructs the class to manage rows from a collection of MBeans. The collection is abstracted as bs, the key column to use is idColumn Name. If the name parameter is the default mbean name "mbean" then all attributes are included. If a different name is specified then only the attributes annotated with that name using TabularAttribute are included.

Parameters:
bs - The collection of MBeans to summarise as a table
idColumnName - The attribute name of the key column for the table
source - The Class of the MBeanImpl
name - Only attributes annotated using TabularAttribute with this name are included
typeName - The JMX type name to use for the composite
typeDescription -
Throws:
javax.management.openmbean.OpenDataException
